fixes.name: View By
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    SELECTEDVALUE('View By'[Display As]),
    "Industry Name", 'stock_data+'[TRBC Industry Name],
    "Activity Name", 'stock_data+'[TRBC Activity Name],

fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau CASE on the parameter to a DAX SWITCH. Replaced the Tableau parameter reference [Parameters].[View By] with SELECTEDVALUE('View By'[Display As]). All column references were transformed to the 'stock_data+'[Column] format to match Power BI syntax.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
